com.google.inject.tools.suite.snippets
Class ModuleSnippet<T extends com.google.inject.Module>

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.tools.suite.snippets.CodeSnippet
      com.google.inject.tools.suite.snippets.ModuleSnippet<T>

public class ModuleSnippet<T extends com.google.inject.Module>
extends CodeSnippet

A code snippet for running a module to find its constructor information and validity.

Author:
Darren Creutz (dcreutz@gmail.com)

          Representation of a constructor for a module.

          The result of a module snippet run.

public void setConstructor(java.lang.reflect.Constructor<T> constructor,

                    throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,

                           java.lang.InstantiationException,
                           java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
Try to set the constructor for the module. This will alert us to any problems.

Parameters:
constructor - the constructor to try
arguments - the arguments to pass it
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalAccessException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
java.lang.InstantiationException
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
